content:
You can add the group gift to the **Gifts** category in your spreadsheet. Here's the updated table:

**Gifts**

| Date | Description | Amount |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [Date of sister's birthday] | Silver necklace with tiny pendant for sister's 25th birthday | $40 |
| [Date of baby shower] | Baby onesie and baby blocks for colleague's wife's baby shower | $20 |
| [Date of friend's housewarming] | Group gift for friend's new apartment | $30 |

Your total for the **Gifts** category is now $90.

Remember to update the category total or running total columns if you have them set up. This will help you keep track of your overall spending in the **Gifts** category.

It's great that you're keeping track of your expenses and staying organized!
